text: Introduction
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Dear friend, When Liberal Democrats launched our 2010 General Election manifesto, few people expected that many of the policies it contained would be implemented by the next Government. But that’s what happened: three quarters of those policies formed the backbone of the Coalition’s programme. Front-page commitments like raising the Income Tax threshold  and investing in the poorest schoolchildren through the Pupil Premium became flagship Coalition policies. With Liberal Democrats in Government to deliver them, those policies have started the work of building a stronger economy and a fairer society, with opportunity spread across the whole United Kingdom. Despite tough economic circumstances, those policies are making a  difference to people’s lives and helping make Britain a freer, greener, more liberal country. But our mission has only just begun. You can’t build a stronger economy and a fairer society, and spread opportunity to every citizen, in five years. For the first time, this is a Liberal Democrat manifesto that builds on a record of policies delivered in national government. We can say we will finish the job of balancing the books, but do so fairly, because we have started that job in this Parliament. We can say we will cut taxes for working people by raising the tax-free allowance to £12,500 because we have raised the tax-free allowance every year since 2010. We can say we will protect funding for education from nursery to 19 because we have protected schools funding and invested in early years education in Government. We can say we will increase health funding and invest in mental health because we have protected the NHS budget in Government and introduced the first ever waiting-time standards for mental health. And we can say we will protect our environment because we have almost trebled the amount of electricity from renewable energy in this Parliament. In our fast-changing world, the fundamental question political parties face is: do we want to continue to be an open society, confident and optimistic about our place in the world, or do we want to become a closed one, increasingly insular and backward-looking? For Liberal Democrats there is only ever one answer: we want an optimistic, open-hearted and outward-looking United Kingdom. In Government for the next five years, Liberal Democrats will continue to build a stronger economy and a fairer society with opportunity for everyone. This manifesto sets out how. Yours, Nick Clegg

text: 1.1 Balancing the budget
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Double innovation spend in our economy, making the UK a world leader in advanced manufacturing, clean technology and digital industries
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Grow a competitive banking sector, support alternative finance providers and improve access to finance for business and consumers
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Expand the Green Investment Bank and set a legally binding decarbonisation target to green our electricity
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Enable more people to travel with rail upgrades across the country and HS2
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 2.1 Economic and industrial growth
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To deliver a balanced economy with strengths in every part of the UK, Britain needs a highly skilled workforce and flexible business support and finance.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We must continue to invest to grow sectors like advanced manufacturing that can provide high-skilled, sustainable jobs,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: open up the supply chain to more small and medium-sized businesses
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and support firms bringing activity back to Britain.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Continue to develop our Industrial Strategy, working with sectors which are critical to Britain’s ability to trade internationally – motor vehicles, aerospace, low-carbon energy, chemicals, creative industries, offshore and subsea technology and more.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Develop the skilled workforce needed to support this growth with a major expansion of high-quality and advanced apprenticeships,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: offering vocational education on a par with academic qualifications,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: backed up with new sector-led National Colleges.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will develop a national skills strategy for key sectors, including low-carbon technologies, to help match skills and people.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Aim to double innovation and research spending across the economy,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: supported by greater public funding on a longer timescale,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: more ‘Catapult’ innovation and technology centres
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and support for green innovation from the Green Investment Bank.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will continue to ringfence the science budget and ensure that, by 2020, both capital and revenue spending have increased at least in line with inflation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Build on the success of the Regional Growth Fund,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: which has already created more than 100,000 jobs
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and secured £1.8 billion of private investment.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will continue the Fund throughout the next Parliament.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Devolve more economic decision-making to local areas,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: building on the success of City Deals and Growth Deals,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: prioritising the transfer of transport, housing and infrastructure funding, skills training and back-to-work support.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Provide further support to medium-sized businesses through a one-stop-shop for accessing government support,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: a dedicated unit in HMRC
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and the development of management skills.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Aim to stimulate local economies, working with Local Enterprise Partnerships to improve their effectiveness and coordination.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will:  Use central government public procurement policy as a tool of local growth and community development, for example by purchasing from diverse sources and using local labour, goods and services,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and encourage local government to do the same.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Continue our work to open up public procurement to small and medium-sized companies
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and to the voluntary sector.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Develop platforms on which government can provide feedback on its suppliers to help quality providers to grow.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 2.2 Banking and financial reform
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The financial crisis of 2008 caused real damage to our economy including one of the largest budget deficits in the world and banks unable to support the real economy.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats have ensured radical reform of the banking industry to make banks safe and no longer requiring a taxpayer safety net.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Building on this progress, we will: Complete implementation of the new rules to separate retail banking from investment banking, working with the financial services industry to promote integrity, accountability and value across the sector.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Expand the British Business Bank to perform a more central role in the economy, tackling the shortage of equity capital for growing firms
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and providing long-term capital for medium-sized businesses.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Develop the UK banking sector to promote competition and innovation by: Facilitating new entrants,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: including through public procurement policy.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Encouraging the growth of crowdfunding and alternative finance models,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: encouraging Local Authorities to use these platforms to improve credit access in their areas.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Promoting a new community banking sector to support small and medium-sized enterprises
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and social enterprises.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Taking forward the recently commissioned study by the British Business Bank into the sustainability of Community Development Finance Institutions.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure access to finance for all, tackling discrimination in the provision of financial services and supporting products that increase financial inclusion.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue the Banking Levy
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and introduce a time-limited supplementary Corporation Tax charge on the banking sector to ensure it continues to make a fair contribution to fiscal consolidation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 2.3 Creating a stable and competitive environment for growth
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Britain needs a stable and competitive environment for growth;
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: this is essential to attract and sustain new businesses and new jobs.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Britain is not just a part of the European economy – we have to compete with the developing economies of Asia and Latin America, which are increasingly powering ahead.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We need to lock in macroeconomic stability, including low inflation, and reduce the risks of a return to the economics of boom and bust.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: And we need a tax system that is simple, fair and competitive
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: – which attracts and retains jobs in our country,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: while ensuring business makes a fair contribution.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Continue to support an independent Bank of England, with a mandate to keep inflation low and stable to support sustainable growth.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will protect the new regulatory framework, which ensures the Bank of England has the necessary tools to help avoid a return to boom and bust.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue to reform business tax to ensure it stays competitive, making small and medium-sized enterprises the priority for any business tax cuts.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will work to adjust the tax system away from subsidy of high leverage debt and tackle the bias against equity investment
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Reform and improve the Regulatory Policy Committee to reduce regulatory uncertainty and remove unnecessary business regulation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We understand that well-designed regulation, focused on outcomes rather than processes, has a vital role in creating markets and driving investment
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and will use it, in particular, to promote low-carbon and resource-efficient innovation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In England we will complete the ongoing review of Business Rates, prioritising reforms that lessen the burden on smaller businesses,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: ensure high streets remain competitive
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and promote more efficient use of land.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats remain committed to introducing Land Value Tax (LVT), which would replace Business Rates in the longer term and could enable the reduction or abolition of other taxes.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will extend the Business Rates review to ensure it considers the implementation of LVT, as well as interim reforms like Site Value Rating that could be completed within five years.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will charge the Land Registry with completing registration of all substantial land and property holdings in England and Wales by 2020.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 2.4 Green jobs and industry
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: New world markets are developing in low-carbon and resource-efficient technologies.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Britain’s real strengths in sectors like offshore wind power and low-carbon vehicles, and in green finance, make us well placed to compete.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We must make sure green industries can reach their full potential and build on successes in increasing recycling to shift towards a so-called ‘circular economy’ in which we use natural resources efficiently and minimise waste. (See also Section 6.2)
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Pass a Zero Carbon Britain Act to set a new legally binding target to bring net greenhouse gas emissions to zero by 2050.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Realise the full potential of the Green Investment Bank by increasing its capitalisation, expanding its remit, allowing it to raise funds independently and enabling it to issue green bonds.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Place the Natural Capital Committee (NCC) on the same statutory footing as the Committee on Climate Change through our Nature Act.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will task the NCC with identifying the key natural resources being used unsustainably and recommending legally binding targets for reducing their net consumption;
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and introduce incentives for businesses to improve resource efficiency.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Help incentivise sustainable behaviour by increasing the proportion of tax revenue accounted for by green taxes.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Grow the market for green products and services with steadily higher green criteria in public procurement policy,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: extending procurement requirements more widely through the public sector including to the NHS and Academy schools.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In particular we will deliver ambitious reductions in energy use.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Increase research and development and commercialisation support in four key low-carbon technologies where Britain could lead the world:
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: tidal power,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: carbon capture and storage,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: energy storage
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and ultra-low emission vehicles.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure UK Trade and Investment and UK Export Finance can prioritise support for key sectors identified in our Industrial Strategy,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: including exports of green products and technologies,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and press for higher environmental standards for export credit agencies throughout the OECD.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Encourage the creation of green financial products to bring consumer capital into green industries.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will improve the way government handles the cross-cutting challenges of delivering green growth and fighting climate change, establishing a senior Cabinet Committee to coordinate action and bringing together officials in inter-departmental units on issues like air quality and resource management.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will replicate the success of the Office for Budget Responsibility with an Office for Environmental Responsibility scrutinising the government’s efforts to meet its environmental targets.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 2.5 Making the connection: transport infrastructure
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats are leading the renewal of Britain’s ageing infrastructure but we still have decades of under-investment to catch up on.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We need better transport infrastructure,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: a modern railway system,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and less congestion on our roads.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have established our second fiscal rule precisely so we can invest in productive infrastructure to help the economy grow.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Set out 10-year rolling capital investment plans.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Develop a comprehensive plan to electrify the overwhelming majority of the UK rail network,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: reopen smaller stations,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: restore twin-track lines to major routes
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and proceed with HS2, as the first stage of a high-speed rail network to Scotland.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Invest in major transport improvements and infrastructure.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Deliver the Transport for the North strategy to promote growth, innovation and prosperity across northern England.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Develop more modern, resilient links to and within the South West peninsula to help develop and diversify the regional economy
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Complete East-West rail, connecting up Oxford and Cambridge and catalysing major new housing development.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure London’s transport infrastructure is improved to withstand the pressure of population and economic growth.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work to encourage further private sector investment in rail freight terminals and rail-connected distribution parks.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will set a clear objective to shift more freight from road to rail
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and change planning law to ensure new developments provide good freight access to retail, manufacturing and warehouse facilities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure our airport infrastructure meets the needs of a modern and open economy,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: without allowing emissions from aviation to undermine our goal of a zero-carbon Britain by 2050.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will carefully consider the conclusions of the Davies Review into runway capacity and develop a strategic airports policy for the whole of the UK in the light of those recommendations and advice from the Committee on Climate Change.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We remain opposed to any expansion of Heathrow, Stansted or Gatwick and any new airport in the Thames Estuary, because of local issues of air and noise pollution.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will ensure no net increase in runways across the UK.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure new rail franchises include a stronger focus on customers,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: including requirements to integrate more effectively with other modes of transport and a programme of investment in new stations, lines and station facilities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will continue the Access for All programme, improving disabled access to public transport.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Modern light rail systems, like Croydon Tramlink and Manchester Metrolink, have brought significant benefits to passengers.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will encourage Local Authorities to consider trams alongside other options,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and support a new generation of light rail and ultra-light rail schemes in towns and cities where local people want them.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 2.6 Low-carbon energy
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Our reforms of the electricity market have already created the world’s first low-carbon electricity market
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and will stimulate up to 250,000 green jobs across the UK by 2020.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Since 2010, energy demand has fallen by 2.5% a year and renewable electricity generation has almost trebled.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: But we need to go further and faster to meet our goal of reducing energy demand by 50% by 2030.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: If we do not speed up energy efficiency investment, our buildings will continue to leak energy and waste money and our businesses will fail to compete internationally.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will ensure we create a low-carbon economy at the lowest cost for consumers.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Make saving energy a top infrastructure priority,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: stimulating private sector demand with our new Electricity Demand Reduction market,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: new market-shaping energy efficiency standards,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: support for industry, particularly SMEs,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and a programme of tax incentives and public investment.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Our plans for insulating homes are set out in more detail in Section 7.5, below.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Stimulate a minimum of £100 billion more private investment in low-carbon energy infrastructure by 2020.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Set a legally binding decarbonisation target range for 2030 for the power sector of 50–100g of CO2 per kWh, which can largely be achieved by expansion of renewables, with an indicative target of 60% of electricity from renewable sources by 2030.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will support investment in energy storage and smart grid technology to enable this higher reliance on renewables.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work with the independent regulator Ofgem to ensure the costs of electricity distribution and transmission infrastructure are allocated efficiently and fairly between consumers and generators across the country,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and develop more European electricity interconnection capacity.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Regulate to end the use of unabated coal in electricity generation by 2025 because of its high carbon emissions and impact on local air quality,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and require any new gas stations built after 2030 to be fitted with Carbon Capture and Storage (CCS) technology.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will implement a second phase of CCS projects by 2020.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Expand community energy, building on Britain’s first ever community energy strategy with additional financial and regulatory support.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will encourage Councils to be proactive in delivering energy saving and electricity generation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Encourage onshore wind in appropriate locations, helping meet our climate targets at least cost.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will end ideologically motivated interference in local planning decisions for wind farms by Government Ministers.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Accept that new nuclear power stations can play a role in low-carbon electricity supply provided concerns about safety, disposal of waste and cost are adequately addressed
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and without public subsidy for new build.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Use biomass primarily for heating and small-scale power generation,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: act to encourage the wider use of biogas
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and argue for the reform of EU policies on biofuels and biomass which help drive deforestation,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: including ending all support for food-crop-based biofuels after 2020.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue to back new entrants to the energy market, smart meters and faster switching to promote proper competition,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: aiming for at least 30% of the household market to be supplied by competitors to the ‘Big 6’ by 2020.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The UK has significant stores of unconventional gas, which could be accessed through the process known as fracking.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: It is vital that efforts to access this gas be properly regulated to protect our natural environment.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats in government have introduced the world’s most robust regulatory regime for unconventional gas,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: including banning drilling in National Parks,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and will take two further steps to ensure any shale gas contributes to a faster transition to a low-carbon economy.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Establish a Low-carbon Transition Fund using 50% of any tax revenues from shale gas to fund energy efficiency, community energy, low-carbon innovation and renewable heat.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Require that once a shale gas well is finished, it must be offered at no cost to geothermal heat developers, to enable faster expansion of this renewable technology.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 2.7 An open, trading nation
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: As a major global economy, we must promote open markets and free trade, both within the European Union and beyond.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Only as a full member of a reformed European Union can we be certain Britain’s businesses will have access to markets in Europe and beyond.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats believe we should welcome talented people from abroad, encourage visitors and tourists who contribute enormously to our economic growth,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and give sanctuary to refugees fleeing persecution.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Immigration procedures must be robust and fair,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and the UK must remain open to visitors who boost our economy,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and migrant workers who play a vital role in business and public services.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Remain a committed member of the EU so we can complete the Single Market in areas including online industries, the energy market and services,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and help negotiate EU international trade agreements, opening opportunities for British businesses.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Support Single Market disciplines in relation to competition and state aid rules
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: while creating a stronger public interest test for takeovers in research-intensive activities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue to allow high-skill immigration to support key sectors of the economy,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and ensure work, tourist and family visit visas are processed quickly and efficiently.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure the UK is an attractive destination for overseas students,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: not least those who wish to study STEM subjects (Science, Technology, Engineering and Maths).
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will reinstate post-study work visas for STEM graduates who can find graduate-level employment within six months of completing their degree.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Tourism and heritage collectively make up as much as 9% of our economy, and yet these industries do not have the status they deserve in government or in wider society.

text: 3.1 Fair taxes
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: During this Parliament we have gone even further than our manifesto pledge to raise the personal Income Tax threshold to £10,000 a year.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: This April’s increase to £10,600 has lifted more than three million people out of Income Tax altogether
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and delivered a tax cut of more than £800 for millions of low and middle-income taxpayers.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will continue to make taxes fairer and simpler,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: help those on low and middle incomes,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and ensure those on the highest incomes make a fair contribution.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Raise the tax-free Personal Allowance to at least £12,500 by the end of the next Parliament, putting around £400 back in the pockets of millions of working people and pensioners.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will bring forward the planned increase to an £11,000 allowance to April 2016.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Consider, as a next step, and once the Personal Allowance rise is delivered, raising the employee National Insurance threshold to the Income Tax threshold, as resources allow,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: while protecting low earners’ ability to accrue pension and benefit entitlements.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure those with the highest incomes and wealth are making a fair contribution.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have identified a series of distortions, loopholes and excess reliefs that should be removed,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: raising money to contribute to deficit reduction.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: These include reforms to Capital Gains Tax and Dividend Tax relief,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: refocusing Entrepreneurs’ Relief
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and a supplementary Corporation Tax for the banking sector.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In addition, we will introduce a UK-wide High Value Property Levy on residential properties worth over £2 million.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: It will have a banded structure, like Council Tax.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Take tough action against corporate tax evasion and avoidance,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: including by: Setting a target for HM Revenue and Customs to reduce the tax gap
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and continuing to invest in staff to enable them to meet it.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Introducing a general anti-avoidance rule which would outlaw contrived structures designed purely or largely to avoid tax.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Implementing the planned new offence of corporate failure to prevent economic crime, including tax evasion, with penalties for directors up to and including custodial sentences.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Levying penalties on firms proven to facilitate tax evasion, equivalent to the amount of tax evaded by their clients.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Asking the Bank of England’s Financial Policy Committee to consider the approach to paying tax taken by banks for themselves, their employees and for their customers, as part of their assessment of the risks posed by the sector, supported by an annual report by HMRC.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Restrict access to non-domiciled status,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: increasing the charges paid to adopt this status
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and ending the ability to inherit it.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 3.2 Help with childcare costs
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Many parents want to take significant time out from work to care for young children but in many families both parents want or have to work, and the costs of childcare are prohibitive.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have made dramatic improvements over the current Parliament – with Tax-Free Childcare,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: increases in childcare support through the benefit system
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and more free childcare hours for two, three and four-year olds.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: But we need to do more so that all who want to work can do so.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Commit to an ambitious goal of 20 hours’ free childcare a week for all parents with children aged from two to four-years,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and all working parents from the end of paid parental leave (nine months) to two years.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: This will not only help parents afford to work, it will help all children start school confident, happy and ready to learn.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Start by providing 15 hours a week of free childcare to the parents of all two-year olds.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will then prioritise 15 hours free childcare for all working parents with children aged between nine months and two years.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Complete the introduction of Tax-Free Childcare, which will provide up to £2,000 of childcare support for each child
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and include childcare support in Universal Credit, refunding 85% of childcare costs
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: so work pays for low earners.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Creating jobs and helping people find work
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Complete the introduction of Universal Credit (UC), so people are always better off in work.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will review UC to address any issues regarding ‘cliff edges’, and ensure increased working hours are properly incentivised for all claimants.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will retain the overall cap on a household’s benefits and believe this should continue to be set at around the average family income.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Deliver a reformed and improved Work Programme in partnership with English local government, and the national governments of Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: By devolving this support we can ensure help and training are more tailored to local employment markets and better integrated with other services.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will improve incentives for Jobcentre staff and Work Programme providers to ensure there is real help for those furthest from the labour market.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Establish a review of effective ways to promote ‘rainy day’ saving to improve people’s financial resilience,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and reform hardship payments, making it easier for people to bring forward part of their benefit payments to deal with emergencies.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Develop a package of specialist support for carers seeking part-time work or a return to full-time employment.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Review sanctions procedures in Jobcentres.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: While sanctions can be a necessary last resort to ensure jobseekers are looking for work, they should not be used to cut benefit expenditure deliberately.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Reductions in benefits may not always be the best way to improve claimants’ compliance: those with chaotic lives might be more successful in finding a job if they were directed to targeted support with their problems.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will ensure there are no league tables or targets for sanctions issued by Jobcentres
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and introduce a ‘yellow card’ warning so people are only sanctioned if they deliberately and repeatedly break the rules.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats will protect young people’s entitlements to the welfare safety net,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: while getting them the help they need to get their first job.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: That means doubling the number of businesses that hire apprentices.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: It also means providing support that has been proven to work, like work experience placements that help them get a first foot on the career ladder.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: These placements should be tailored for those with disabilities or mental health problems
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and those with parental responsibilities
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and we will work to expand the availability of placements into new sectors including manufacturing, science and technology.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 3.4 Making welfare work
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Working-age benefits make up a significant proportion of public spending, and have long been in need of reform, which we have started in this Parliament.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Through tough choices, we have found savings in the welfare budget
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and we must continue to do so as we balance the books.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: However, we do not support proposals for a lengthy freeze to working age benefits,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and we will not protect benefits for the wealthiest pensioners at the expense of people working on low wages.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Our priority is to tackle the causes of rising benefit bills – high rents, low pay, sickness and unemployment.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Introduce a 1% cap on the uprating of working-age benefits until the budget is balanced in 2017/18,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: after which they will rise with inflation once again.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Disability and parental leave benefits will be exempt from this temporary cap.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Encourage landlords to lower their rent by paying them Housing Benefit directly, with tenants’ consent, in return for a fixed reduction.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Our plans for a major expansion of house building and new ‘family friendly’ tenancies, which limit annual rent increases, will also help reduce upward pressure on rents.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will review the way the Shared Accommodation Rate in Local Housing Allowance is set,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and review the Broad Rental Market Areas to ensure they fit with realistic travel patterns.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Improve links between Jobcentres and Work Programme providers and the local NHS to ensure all those in receipt of health-related benefits are getting the care and support to which they are entitled.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In particular, as we expand access to talking therapies we expect many more people to recover and be able to seek work again.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work with Local Authorities to tackle fraud and error in a more coordinated way, in particular on Housing Benefit.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Help everyone in work on a low wage step up the career ladder and increase their hours,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: reducing their need for benefits,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: with tailored in-work careers and job search advice.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Withdraw eligibility for the Winter Fuel Payment and free TV Licence from pensioners who pay tax at the higher rate (40%).
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will retain the free bus pass for all pensioners.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 3.5 Flexibility at work and fair pay
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Britain’s employment laws are among the best in the world,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: balancing the needs of business for flexibility
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: with the rights of staff to fair treatment.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Nonetheless there are still too many examples of low pay, exploitation, and bad practice, which contribute to unacceptable levels of inequality in our society.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: This has to change: the more people earn a decent wage, the fewer will be dependent on benefits or stuck in poverty.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Encourage employers to provide more flexible working,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: expanding Shared Parental Leave with an additional ‘use it or lose it’ month to encourage fathers to take time off with young children.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: While changes to parental leave should be introduced slowly to give business time to adjust, our ambition is to see Paternity and Shared Parental Leave become a ‘day one’ right.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure swift implementation of the new rules requiring companies with more than 250 employees to publish details of the different pay levels of men and women in their organisation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will build on this platform and, by 2020, extend transparency requirements to include publishing the number of people paid less than the Living Wage
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and the ratio between top and median pay.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will also consult on requirements for companies to conduct and publish a full equality pay review,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and to consult staff on executive pay.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ask the Low Pay Commission to look at ways of raising the National Minimum Wage, without damaging employment opportunities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will improve enforcement action and clamp down on abuses by employers seeking to avoid paying the minimum wage by reviewing practices such as unpaid internships.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Establish an independent review to consult on how to set a fair Living Wage across all sectors.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will pay this Living Wage in all central government departments and their agencies from April 2016,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and encourage other public sector employers to do likewise.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Improve the enforcement of employment rights, reviewing Employment Tribunal fees to ensure they are not a barrier.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will ensure employers cannot avoid giving their staff rights or paying the minimum wage by wrongly classifying them as workers or self-employed.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats understand that flexible employment contracts – including Zero Hours contracts – can work well for employees and businesses.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: But that is not always the case and we will continue to stamp out abuse.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will create a formal right to request a fixed contract
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and consult on introducing a right to make regular patterns of work contractual after a period of time.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 3.6 Improving support for the hardest to help
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: For too long, sickness benefits were used as a way of parking people away from the unemployment statistics.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Our aim is to get everyone the support and help they need, both financially and in terms of advice and support.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: That does require a formal assessment: but these tests have to be fair and should not be an extra burden for vulnerable people.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: That is why we have made many improvements to the assessments introduced by the last government.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We want to aim even higher, ensuring assessments are truly fair, with quick access to financial help for those who cannot work, and support for those who can.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Conduct a review of the Work Capability Assessment and Personal Independence Payment assessments to ensure they are fair, accurate and timely and evaluate the merits of a public sector provider.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Invest to clear any backlog in assessments for Disability Living Allowance and Personal Independence Payment.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Simplify and streamline back-to-work support for people with disabilities, mental or physical health problems.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will aim for the goal of one assessment and one budget for disabled and sick people to give them more choice and control.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Raise awareness of, and seek to expand, Access to Work, which supports people with disabilities in work.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Reform the policy to remove the spare room subsidy.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Existing social tenants will not be subject to any housing benefit reduction until they have been offered reasonable alternative accommodation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will ensure tenants who need an extra bedroom for genuine medical reasons are entitled to one in any assessment of their Housing Benefit needs,

text: and those whose homes are substantially adapted do not have their Housing Benefit reduced.

text: 3.7 Help to save for and enjoy your retirement
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Life expectancy is increasing.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: This is obviously good news, but it brings challenges; older people may need a pension income that will last for 20, 30 or even 40 years.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We want to build on the world-leading reforms Liberal Democrats in government have introduced since 2010.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have abolished the default retirement ages so older people cannot be forced out of work on grounds of age.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have reversed decades of decline in pensioner incomes by uprating the state pension in line with our ‘triple lock’ guarantee.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have introduced a new single tier pension to make saving simple.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have auto-enrolled five million people into a pension for the first time.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: And we have scrapped the rules that dictated how you receive your pension, so now you can spend your savings as you see fit.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We want Britain to be the best place in the world to save for, and enjoy, your retirement.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Continue the introduction of our simpler single tier pension so people can plan ahead securely, and feel the benefit of every pound they save.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Legislate for the Liberal Democrat ‘triple lock’ of increasing the State Pension each year by the highest of earnings growth, prices growth or 2.5%.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure pensioners are eligible to gain from the increased Personal Allowance of £12,500.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Improve workplace pensions and continue to auto-enrol workers, completing the rollout of this scheme in full and on time.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will crack down on charges and encourage people to save more into their pension pot through this scheme.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Press ahead with plans to allow people more freedom in the use of their pension pots and to allow existing pensioners to sell their annuity.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Establish a review to consider the case for, and practical implications of, introducing a single rate of tax relief for pensions, which would be designed to be simpler and fairer and which would be set more generously than the current 20% basic rate relief.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 3.8 Protecting consumers and keeping bills low
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Confident consumers encourage innovation and competition, which strengthen our economy.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have radically overhauled consumer rights law, making it simpler and clearer and for the first time protecting consumers buying digital content.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have driven competition in the energy sector, speeded up switching, and simplified tariffs so customers can always get the best deal.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have ended the era of above-inflation rail fare increases.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have clamped down on unscrupulous payday lenders and strengthened protections for vulnerable consumers against rogue traders.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In the next Parliament we want to go further.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Force energy companies to allow customers to change to any cheaper supplier in just 24 hours,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and extend the principle of ‘gainer led’ switching, where your new provider organises your switch for you, into new sectors, including telecoms.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.
Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Give people easier to understand information about their own energy use, with appropriate privacy protections,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: with a national rollout of smart electricity and gas meters.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will guarantee that anyone on a prepayment meter can choose a smart meter instead by 2017.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Help people form new energy cooperatives so they can benefit from group discounts and cut their bills.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Protect high streets and consumers by granting new powers to Local Authorities to reduce the proliferation of betting shops and substantially reducing the maximum stakes for Fixed Odds Betting Terminals.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure rail fares rise no faster than inflation over the Parliament as a whole.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Require the Sports Ground Safety Authority to prepare guidance under which domestic football clubs, working with their supporters, may introduce safe standing areas.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue and expand the midata project into new sectors, giving consumers the right to access data businesses hold on them in an open and reusable format.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 3.9 Driving up standards in public services
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Citizens expect a good service from their public services, and rightly so.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: While many schools, hospitals, libraries and other public institutions offer world-class standards, we could do so much better: integrating services and making them more accessible, as well as improving the response when things go wrong.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats value the important role the voluntary, independent and community sectors play in the life of our communities and in delivering public services.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To ensure all providers of public services are accountable to their users and the public, a public authority (if possible a democratically accountable one) should always take the decision about whether a service should be provided or commissioned.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Improve consumer protections in public services, with a review of complaints handling processes,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: exploring the options of mirroring the private sector ‘super-complaint’ system in the public sector
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and reforms to the current system of ombudsmen.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Introduce a ‘community trigger’ mechanism to enable the public to require a review of the provision of a particular service being delivered consistently poorly.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Extend Freedom of Information laws to cover private companies delivering public services.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work with Local Authorities to bring services together at a local level to provide a better service to citizens
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and support users in pooling their personal budgets into mutual support arrangements.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue and expand the What Works Network to promote evidence-based policy making,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: establish an incubator for social enterprises developing innovative solutions to policy problems
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and expand the use of public competitions to encourage innovation in public services.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Require the highest standards of data protection by public service providers, including requiring that where data is used for research purposes it must be anonymised wherever possible,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and impose a moratorium on the creation of new government databases without Parliamentary authority.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats have put education at the heart of our agenda for a generation.
