text: 4.1 High-quality early years education
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: If we want a more equal society, we must get help to all those who might fall behind, and their parents, right from the start.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: That means improving early education
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and protecting the wide range of family support services offered in Children’s Centres.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We must improve the quality of early years teaching,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and raise the status of those who work in early years.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Raise the quality of early years provision and ensure that by 2020 every formal early years setting employs at least one person who holds an Early Years Teacher qualification.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Working with organisations like Teach First, we will recruit more staff with Early Years Qualified status,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and extend full Qualified Teacher status, terms and conditions to all those who are properly trained.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Increase our Early Years Pupil Premium – which gives early years settings extra money to help children from disadvantaged backgrounds – to £1,000 per pupil per year.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue to support Local Authorities in providing Children’s Centres, especially in areas of high need,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: encouraging integration with other community services like health visitors,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and in particular reviewing the support and advice available for parents on early child nutrition and breastfeeding.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Improve the identification of Special Educational Needs and disability at the earliest possible stage, so targeted support can be provided
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and primary schools are better prepared for their intake of pupils.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 4.2 Driving up school standards
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: There is much to be proud of in our schools today, and much that has been improved in the last few years.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: But far too many children are still failing to get the qualifications they need.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The gaps between rich and poor are still too wide.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We cannot fail our children – especially when we know it is the children who need the most help who are the most likely to be let down.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Protect the education budget in real terms from the early years to age 19.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will at least protect the schools’ Pupil Premium in real terms,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: consider carefully the merits of extending the Premium,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and introduce a fair National Funding Formula.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Set a clear ambition for all children to achieve a good grasp of Maths and English, aiming to eradicate child illiteracy and innumeracy by 2025.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: `We will set an interim goal that all children should start school with good language skills by 2020.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Strengthen school leadership and governance.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will provide rapid support and intervention to help ensure that all schools become good or outstanding.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Our Talented Head Teachers programme will expand, helping move top leaders to where they are most needed.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Increase the number of Teaching Schools – centres of teaching excellence that provide support to other schools.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure there is an effective, democratically accountable, ‘middle tier’ to support and intervene in schools where problems are identified.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will encourage local head teachers with a strong record to play a key role in school improvement through a local Head Teacher Board, working with schools and Local Authorities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will abolish unelected Regional Schools Commissioners.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Allow Ofsted to inspect both Local Authorities and academy chains.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Local authorities and academy chains which are failed by Ofsted for intervention work will be required to work with stronger organisations or be replaced.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Rule out state-funded profit-making schools.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Give democratically accountable Local Authorities clear responsibility for local school places planning.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will only fund new mainstream schools in areas where school places are needed,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and repeal the rule that all new state funded schools must be free schools or academies.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will allow Local Authorities to select the school sponsor, where this is not the Local Authority itself.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure a fair local schools admissions process.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Implement the Children’s Commissioner’s report They Go The Extra Mile into the prevention of and positive alternatives to exclusion, and strengthen appeals panels.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Extend free school meals to all children in primary education as resources allow and following a full evaluation of free meals for infants.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue to promote the local integration of health, care and educational support for children with Special Educational Needs and health problems.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will allow parents to continue to choose faith-based schools within the state-funded sector and allow the establishment of new faith schools.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will ensure all faith schools develop an inclusive admissions policy and end unfair discrimination on grounds of faith when recruiting staff,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: except for those principally responsible for optional religious instruction.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 4.3 World-class teaching
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Great teachers are at the heart of a successful education system.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will continue our work to attract the best into the profession and support teachers throughout their careers.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We want to build the status of the teaching profession, support and nurture teachers in their work, and so drive up standards in every school.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Guarantee all teachers in state-funded schools will be fully qualified or working towards Qualified Teacher Status (QTS) from September 2016.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Introduce a clear and properly funded entitlement to professional development for all teachers.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will raise the bar for entry to the profession, requiring a B grade minimum in GCSE Maths and English, allowing us to abolish the separate Maths and English tests.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Help establish a new profession-led Royal College of Teachers, eventually to oversee Qualified Teacher Status and professional development.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We do not believe Ministers should dictate teaching practice and will not issue instructions about how to structure the school day or what kind of lessons to conduct.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue to support the Teach First programme to attract high calibre graduates into teaching, in particular in STEM subjects.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Tackle unnecessary teacher workload, including by: Avoiding policy changes while children are within a key stage.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Establishing the right accountability framework for schools.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensuring Ofsted inspections are high-quality, fair to all schools and focus on outcomes and not processes.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Establish a new National Leadership Institute to promote high-quality leadership and help the best leaders into the most challenging schools.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue to work with the Education Endowment Foundation to establish a comprehensive evidence base on what works in teaching, including assessing play-based learning in early education,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and tackling the attainment gap.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We need to encourage and inspire more children to study STEM subjects.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: At primary level we will encourage schools to have at least one science specialist among the staff,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and at secondary level work to maximise the number of teachers who have degree qualifications in the subjects they teach.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 4.4 Curriculum and qualifications
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We want schools to have flexibility and freedom, but we also believe that both parents and children need to know that the school curriculum will cover the essentials,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and that teachers will be skilled educators who know how to inspire a love of learning.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: That is why we have developed our Parents’ Guarantee: every child will be taught by qualified teachers,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and the core curriculum will be taught at every state-funded school.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We want the highest standards in our schools, and will ensure that every child has a thorough grasp of the basics.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: But we also understand that a great education is about more than just learning facts:
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: creativity should be nurtured,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: children should be helped to develop the life skills they will need as adults,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and every pupil should be given advice and guidance about their future.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Establish an independent Educational Standards Authority (ESA) entirely removed from Ministerial interference.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The ESA will have responsibility for curriculum content and examination standards.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Introduce a minimum curriculum entitlement – a slimmed down core national curriculum, which will be taught in all state-funded schools.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: This will include Personal, Social and Health Education: a ‘curriculum for life’ including financial literacy, first aid and emergency lifesaving skills, citizenship, and age-appropriate sex and relationship education.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To ensure all children learn about a wide range of religious and nonreligious world views, religious education will be included in the core curriculum;
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 5.4 Better access to GPs and community care
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Most people’s experience of the NHS is their local GP, or the nurses and support staff who visit them at home or work in community clinics.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Better access to care in GP surgeries and closer to home is better for patients and will also help reduce pressure on hospitals, A&E departments and ambulances.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Ensure easier access to GPs, expanding evening and weekend opening,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: encouraging phone and Skype appointments,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: encouraging GPs to work together in federations, and allowing people more choice.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Encourage GPs and other community clinicians to work in disadvantaged areas though our Patient Premium.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Better utilise the network of community pharmacists across the country so they become the first point of contact for advice on minor illnesses and are joined-up with GPs and community health teams.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Encourage health services to link up with Local Authority social care teams and voluntary services to join up care.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Review the rules for exemption from prescription charges to ensure they are fair to those with long-term conditions and disabilities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 5.5 Aiming higher: following the evidence to  improve health and care
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will set ambitious goals so everything we do in the NHS is focused on helping people in Britain live longer, healthier, lives.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Early diagnosis is absolutely crucial and can make a life-saving difference, so we will support screening programmes where these are proven to be both clinically and cost-effective.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: It is also vital we invest in research to develop new treatments and find new ways of delivering innovative treatments in affordable ways.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Set ambitious goals to improve outcomes for the most serious life-threatening diseases like cancer and long-term conditions like dementia.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work towards a global deal to release significant additional funds for finding a cure or preventive treatment for dementia, doubling NHS research spend for this condition by 2020.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Set clear goals for earlier diagnosis and improved aftercare for conditions like cancer and heart disease.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Promote evidence-based ‘social prescribing’ of sport, arts and other activity to help tackle obesity, mental health problems and other health conditions,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and work to widen the evidence base.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue to introduce evidence-based screening programmes, encouraging increased participation with informed consent.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Improve patient safety by updating the laws on regulation of health professionals and on cosmetic procedures.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure targets in the NHS are evidence-based and do not distort clinical priorities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Improve support for groups that often face lower standards of care, such as older people and people with mental health problems or learning disabilities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Get the best for the NHS out of innovative medicines and treatments while continuing to ensure value for money for the NHS in negotiations on the cost of medicines, promoting the use of generic medicines where appropriate.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Support, including through rules on public funding and research, moves towards ensuring all clinical trials are registered, with their methods and summary results reported in public.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will develop a just settlement for haemophiliacs who were given contaminated blood, and their families.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 5.6 Helping people keep healthy
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: It is better for patients and for the NHS if we keep people healthy in the first place, rather than just waiting until people develop illnesses and come for treatment.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: This means doing more to promote healthy eating and exercise,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: making people aware of the dangers of smoking and excessive consumption of alcohol and other drugs,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and helping to improve mental health and wellbeing.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In government we have taken significant steps, taking tobacco off display in shops and introducing standardised packaging, for example.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have also returned the delivery of public health services to Local Authorities to ensure a more coordinated and localised approach.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Improving our environment is a vital step to improving people’s health.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: By insulating homes we can reduce the number of people who become unwell because of the cold;
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: by tackling air pollution we can attack the root causes of many deaths;
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: by opening up more sports facilities and building more cycle routes we can cut obesity and reduce heart problems.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Support effective public awareness campaigns like Be Clear on Cancer, working closely with charities to raise awareness of the signs and symptoms of killer diseases.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Keep public health within local government, where it is effectively joined-up with preventive community services.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Restrict the marketing of junk food to children, including restricting TV advertising before the 9pm watershed,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and maintain the effective ‘Five a Day’ campaign.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Encourage the traffic light labelling system for food products and publication of information on calorie, fat, sugar and salt content in restaurants and takeaways.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Reduce smoking rates, including by completing the introduction of standardised packaging for tobacco products.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will introduce a tax levy on tobacco companies so they fairly contribute to the costs of health care and smoking cessation services, subject to consultation on the detailed design and practicalities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Carefully monitor the growing evidence base around electronic cigarettes, which appear to be a route by which many people are quitting tobacco,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and ensure restrictions on marketing and use are proportionate and evidence-based.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: For example, we support restrictions on advertising which risks promoting tobacco or targets under 18s, such as those introduced in 2014, but would rule out a statutory ban on ‘vaping’ in public places.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Introduce Minimum Unit Pricing for alcohol, subject to the outcome of the legal challenge in Scotland,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and support the greater use of Local Authority powers and criminal behaviour orders to help communities tackle alcohol-related crime and disorder.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Pass a Nature Act to increase access to green spaces
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and a Green Transport Act to cut air pollution.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 5.7 Help for carers
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The number of family carers is rising, including in the ‘sandwich generation’ who find themselves trying to care for their children and their parents at the same time.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Carers are unsung heroes and we need to do more to help them.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have already invested £400m in carers’ breaks, but we can and must go further.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Introduce an annual Carer’s Bonus of £250 for carers looking after someone for 35 hours or more each week.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work to raise the amount you can earn before losing Carer’s Allowance from £110 to £150 a week.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Consult on introducing five days’ paid additional ‘care leave’ a year for carers who qualify for the Carer’s Allowance.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Give the NHS a legal duty to identify carers and develop a Carer’s Passport scheme to inform carers of their rights in the NHS, like more flexible visiting hours, assert their role as expert partners in care and gain access to support.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 5.8 Improving social care
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Although we want to support people to remain independent as long as possible, many people will eventually need to rely on the care system.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats fought hard to secure the cap on the cost of care that will be introduced in 2017,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: but the quality of care is vital too.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have introduced rigorous new inspections under the Chief Inspector of Social Care and new guidance to end the use of fifteen-minute visits.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will end ‘care cramming’, which turns care workers into clockwatchers rushing between jobs.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We are clamping down on care workers being paid less than the National Minimum Wage by resourcing and directing HMRC to pursue and prosecute providers who exploit their staff.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Finish the job of implementing the Dilnot Report proposals for a cap on the cost of social care.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Provide more choice at the end of life, and free end-of-life social care for those placed on their local end-of-life register if evidence shows it is affordable and cost effective.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ask the Care Quality Commission to showcase examples of good and bad practice in care commissioning by Councils.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Raise the professional status and training of care home managers through statutory licensing.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure those who work in the care sector are properly trained and suitable to practice by introducing a statutory code of conduct backed up by a care workers’ suitability register.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work with local government and providers to promote paying a Living Wage.

text: 6.1 Protecting nature
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Britain’s natural environment is precious.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Without our green spaces, we would live less satisfying lives; they are critical to health, wellbeing and our sense of community.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Even in cash terms, short-term profits from exploiting the environment carry a longer-term penalty in squandered resources, clear-up costs and the impact on health.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will ensure that protecting the natural environment becomes a core commitment of every government department and agency.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Pass a Nature Act to put the Natural Capital Committee (NCC) on a statutory footing,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: set natural capital targets, including on biodiversity, clean air and water,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and empower the NCC to recommend actions to meet these targets.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Significantly increase the amount of accessible green space.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will complete the coastal path,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: introduce a fuller Right to Roam
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and a new designation of National Nature Parks to protect up to a million acres of accessible green space valued by local communities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Place the management of public forests on a sustainable footing, in line with the recommendations of the Independent Panel on Forestry,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and plant at least an additional tree for every child born – about 750,000 every year – as part of a major afforestation plan.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Tackle wildlife and environmental crime with increased enforcement of environmental regulations by all relevant authorities
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and higher penalties to ensure environmental crime is not a financial risk worth taking.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Improve UK enforcement of the EU Birds and Habitats Directive.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Bring forward a package of measures to protect bees and other pollinators, including legal protection for bumblebee nests.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Designate an ecologically coherent network of marine protected areas with appropriate management by 2020.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Encourage the uptake of water metering, including introducing metering in all defined water-stressed areas by 2025,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: coupled with the development of national social tariffs to protect low-income households.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Britain has a real opportunity to lead the way, generating sustainable prosperity and jobs.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue to improve standards of animal welfare, building on Britain’s leadership.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will review the use of cages, crates and routine preventive antibiotics.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: with fair treatment for the inshore small boat fleet.

text: 6.4 Adapting to climate change
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The devastating floods experienced over the past few years are a sign of accelerating climate change,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: exacerbated by changing patterns of land use.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 6.5 Air quality and greener transport

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 6.6. Improving local public transport
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will support local areas that want to bring forward plans for regulating the bus network in their area.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 6.7 Sustainable rural communities
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: A thriving rural community needs local services and community facilities like schools, public transport, local shops, cultural venues and pubs.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: It needs enough homes, affordable for local families, to ensure those services are viable.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 7.1 Building more and better homes
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: For far too long Britain has built many fewer homes than we need;
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: unless we build enough to meet demand, year after year, we will find housing costs rise further out of reach.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: That is why we have set an ambitious target of increasing the rate of house building to 300,000 a year.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Within the first year of the next Parliament, we will publish a long-term plan that sets out how this goal will be achieved.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Our plans will include: At least ten new Garden Cities in England, in areas where there is local support, providing tens of thousands of high-quality new homes, with gardens and shared green space, jobs, schools and public transport.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will encourage rural Local Authorities to follow these principles on a smaller scale, too, developing new garden villages or suburbs as part of their plans for growth.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Up to five major new settlements along a Garden Cities Railway between Oxford and Cambridge.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ambitious targets for development on unwanted public sector sites through the Homes and Communities Agency,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: with Local Authorities given new powers to ensure development happens on any unused site in which the public sector has an interest.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: A review of Compulsory Purchase legislation to facilitate site assembly, including for Garden Cities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will also pilot techniques for capturing the increase in land values from the granting of planning permission, helping to deliver our Garden Cities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: A government commissioning programme to boost house building towards our 300,000 target; where the market alone fails to deliver sufficient numbers, government agencies will directly commission homes for sale and rent to fill the gap.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We are already piloting this direct approach in Cambridgeshire.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: A new government-backed Housing Investment Bank to provide long-term capital for major new settlements and help attract finance for major house building projects.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 7.2 Improving planning
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Good planning is essential to delivering sustainable communities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: With effective planning rules, we can ensure the new homes we build are well connected to public transport,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: resilient to the threats of climate change,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: safe, warm and secure, and situated in real communities where people can easily come together.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will work with Local Authorities to ensure they think for the long term, and use their powers to facilitate an affordable local housing market.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Put Local Authorities in the driving seat for plan-led development by requiring them to make a plan for 15 years of housing need, working collaboratively with neighbouring Councils where necessary to identify sites.

text: We will strengthen the Duty to Cooperate to help authorities –  like Cambridge, Oxford and Luton – with insufficient space within the Local Authority boundary to meet housing demand to grow, through development on sites beyond the Local Authority boundaries
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: . This long-term approach will enable us to secure the homes we need while being much stricter about proposals that deviate from the Local Plan.

text: We will: Create a Community Right of Appeal in cases where planning decisions go against the approved local plan, or a Local Plan that is emerging and has undergone substantive consultation.

text: 7.3 Affordable housing

text: The government has an essential role to play in supporting the development of affordable housing.

text: We have maintained a substantial programme of affordable house building in the last five years, in part enabled by designing innovative products that can deliver new homes at a lower cost.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will continue to innovate, enabling Local Authorities, Housing Associations and central government alike to build many more homes.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Review the Homes and Communities Agency’s grant programmes to simplify and streamline the process and enable more innovation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will refocus the Vacant Building Credit so it only applies to properties that have been vacant for an extended period.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Tackle overcrowding with a new system to incentivise social landlords to reduce the number of tenants under-occupying their homes, freeing up larger properties.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Introduce a new Intermediate Housing Fund to fund intermediate housing products, including:
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Affordable Rent homes, at up to 80% of local market rent.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Shared Ownership homes, where customers buy a proportion of the home and pay an affordable rent for the rest.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: New build shared accommodation at the local LHA Shared Accommodation Rate.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We recognise that most people aspire to own their own home, and believe in supporting people on the journey to home ownership.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: But policies that promote home ownership should be focused on newly built homes to prevent artificial pressure on prices, and should not discriminate on the basis of previous housing tenure.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 7.4 Protecting private tenants and leaseholders
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: More and more people –  including families –  are renting in the private sector for the long term.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We believe private renting is an important part of the housing market, but the balance has shifted too far against the tenant, and more needs to be done to help people making a home in rented property.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Improve protections against rogue landlords and encourage a new multi-year tenancy with an agreed inflation-linked annual rent increase built in.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Enable Local Authorities to operate licensing schemes for rental properties in areas where they believe it is needed.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Establish a voluntary register of rented property where either the landlord or the tenant can register the property, to improve enforcement and tax transparency.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ban letting agent fees to tenants if the transparency requirements we introduced are not successful in bringing fees down to an affordable level by the end of 2016.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Extend the use of Rent Repayment Orders to allow tenants to have their rent refunded when a property is found to contain serious risks to health,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and withhold rent from landlords who have not carried out court-ordered improvements within a reasonable period of time
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Introduce a new Help to Rent scheme to provide government-backed tenancy deposit loans for all first-time renters under 30.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Conduct a full review of the help single people get under homelessness legislation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 7.5 Affordable warmth and greener homes
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Warming our homes is an essential part of the fight against climate change,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and also vital to keep bills affordable.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Energy prices in Britain are lower than the EU average but our bills are higher because our homes are so poorly insulated.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have made huge advances in this Parliament, increasing standards for newly built homes, and improving more than a million homes in just two years.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In the next Parliament we will go further, ensuring at least four million homes are improved by 2020,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: not only lowering bills and helping to tackle the scourge of fuel poverty,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: but generating jobs too.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Remove exemptions in the Zero Carbon Standard for new homes, increasing the standard steadily and extending it to non-domestic buildings from 2019.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will promote the development of off-site manufacturing techniques, which have been shown to improve energy performance of buildings.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Pass a new Green Buildings Act to set new energy efficiency targets, including a long-term ambition for every home to reach at least an energy rating of Band C by 2035.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Act to tackle fuel poverty, ensuring all low-income homes are brought up to Band C by 2027,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: with continued support for the Green Deal Communities programme, enabling local Councils to provide help street by street.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Improve the standard of private rented and social housing, requiring these homes to be upgraded to Band C by 2027.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Introduce incentives to help everyone invest in energy efficiency:
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: A Council Tax reduction of at least £100 for 10 years, when the resident’s home has an energy saving improvement of at least two bands.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: A new Feed Out Tariff for investment in solid wall insulation, the most expensive and difficult energy saving investment for some homes.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Reform the Green Deal ‘pay as you save’ scheme into a new Green Homes Loan Scheme,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: funding renewable heat and electricity alongside energy efficiency.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Boost community energy efficiency by empowering the Green Investment Bank to develop innovative financial products for whole street or district-wide energy efficiency retrofits.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Develop a range of targeted, innovative programmes to support the above, including infrastructure funding where appropriate, such as: ‘Insulation on prescription’ to link up the NHS with the fuel poverty agenda.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: An Off-Gas-Grid Strategy to help rural areas benefit from new technologies.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Interest-free loans to fund energy efficiency home improvements.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 8.1 Equality and diversity
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: A fair society should treat its citizens equally and with dignity.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In this Parliament, thanks to Liberal Democrats in government, there have been key advances in the fight for equality – like introducing same-sex marriage and banning age discrimination.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: But we must continue our work to fight prejudice and discrimination based on race, age, religion or belief, gender, sexuality, and disability.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will enact the remaining unimplemented clauses of the Equality Act 2010.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To advance the cause of women and gender equality we will: Set an ambitious goal to see a million more women in work by 2020 thanks to more jobs, better childcare, and better back-to-work support.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Challenge gender stereotyping and early sexualisation, working with schools to promote positive body image
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and widespread understanding of sexual consent law,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and break down outdated perceptions of gender appropriateness of particular academic subjects.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work to end the gender pay gap, including with new rules on gender pay transparency.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue the drive for diversity in business leadership, maintaining momentum towards at least 30% of board members being women
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and encouraging gender diversity among senior managers, too.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will work to achieve gender equity in government programmes that support entrepreneurs.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To promote equality in relationships and for LGBT+ individuals, we will:
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Give legal rights and obligations to cohabiting couples in the event of relationship breakdown or one partner dying without a will.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Permit humanist weddings and opposite sex civil partnerships, and liberalise the rules about the location, timing and content of wedding ceremonies.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Support schools to tackle homophobic and transphobic bullying and discrimination,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and to establish a tolerant and inclusive environment for all their pupils.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will remove schools’ exemption from the bar on harassment in these areas
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: while protecting the right to teach about religious doctrine.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Promote international recognition of same sex marriages and civil partnerships as part of a comprehensive International LGBT Rights Strategy that supports the cause of decriminalising homosexuality in other countries.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Seek to pardon all those with historic convictions for consensual homosexual activity between adults.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Enhance the experience of all football fans by making homophobic chanting a criminal offence, like racist chanting.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ask the Advisory Committee on Safety of Blood, Tissues and Organs periodically to review rules around men who have sex with men donating blood to consider what restrictions remain necessary.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To tackle the racial discrimination faced by Black, Asian and Minority Ethnic (BAME) people we will: Build on the Coalition’s BAME Access to Finance report to identify ways to encourage more BAME applicants to apply for finance and set up small business.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will publish diversity data on government entrepreneurship programmes and seek to achieve fair representation of BAME communities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Encourage businesses to ensure at least one place on their board is filled by a BAME candidate.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Monitor and tackle the BAME pay gap.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Outlaw caste discrimination.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Maintain funding for people to develop and improve their English language skills to enable them to fully participate in society and achieve their potential.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Challenge discrimination in the criminal justice system by: Improving the safeguards in police stop and search powers in England and Wales with tighter guidance
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and requiring police to wear body cameras in Section 60 areas, the establishment of which will require judicial sanction.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Boosting police recruitment from BAME groups.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Conducting a full review of the causes of the overrepresentation of BAME individuals in the criminal justice system.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To tackle religious discrimination and support faith and belief communities in working together we will: Continue support for the Interfaith Network to promote strong and sustainable relations between different faith communities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Support projects aimed at tackling intolerance such as Show Racism the Red Card and the Anne Frank Trust UK.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work closely with faith and community organisations, such as the Community Security Trust (which works to protect the Jewish community against antisemitic attacks) and the Muslim Council of Britain, to prevent hate crime,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: including at places of worship like synagogues and mosques.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We are determined to combat antisemitism and anti-Muslim hate in the UK and internationally.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To empower people with disabilities to live full lives and achieve their potential we will: Improve the benefits system for disabled people, based on the principle of one assessment, one budget.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: This will bring together support like Personal Independence Payment, Employment Support Allowance, a replacement for the Independent Living Fund and health and social care entitlements.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will implement the proposals set out in the 2015 Green Paper on Learning Disabilities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure disabled people who need an extra room are entitled to one in any assessment of their Housing Benefit needs.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Help greater numbers of disabled people work by encouraging employers to shortlist any qualified disabled candidate
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and providing advice about workplace adaptation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Maintain Disabled Students’ Allowance to ensure students with disabilities receive appropriate support in their university studies,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and review the impact of any changes to consider additional protections for the most vulnerable students with disabilities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Make it easier to get around by: Making more stations wheelchair accessible and giving wheelchair users priority over children’s buggies when space is limited.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Bringing into effect the provisions of the 2010 Equality Act on discrimination by private hire vehicles and taxis.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Improving the legislative framework governing Blue Badges.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Building on our successes in improving wheelchair access to improve accessibility of public transport for people with other disabilities, including visual and auditory impairment.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Setting up a benchmarking standard for accessible cities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Tackle disability hate crime by ensuring proper monitoring of incidents by police forces and other public authorities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Formally recognise British Sign Language as an official language of the United Kingdom.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To ensure the highest standards of equality and fairness in public services we will: Maintain the Public Sector Equality Duty
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and encourage external providers to the public sector to follow best practice in terms of diversity.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Prohibit discrimination on the grounds of religion in the provision of public services.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Move to ‘name blank’ recruitment wherever possible in the public sector.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Replicate the civil service accelerated programme for underrepresented groups across the public sector.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Require diversity in Public Appointments.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will introduce a presumption that every shortlist should include a BAME candidate.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will establish an independent committee that will monitor the drive for greater diversity in public appointments and verify the independence of the appointment process to public bodies, boards and institutions.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work to ensure the shift to Digital by Default for public services does not leave people behind, by upholding the highest standards of accessibility in digital services and maintaining government programmes on digital inclusion.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Freedom of speech and the free press
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: As the Charlie Hebdo attacks in Paris showed, freedom of expression cannot be taken for granted.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In an open society there can be no right ‘not to be offended’, which is why Liberal Democrats in government have strengthened the law to make it harder for prosecutions to be brought for using 'insulting words',
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and have led the way in protecting journalists’ sources under the 2000 Regulation of Investigatory Powers Act (RIPA).
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Yet censorship and self-censorship are still rife, and the threat of prosecution can have a chilling effect on the willingness of people to speak out against injustice and corruption.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To change this and promote investigative journalism, we will: Introduce statutory public interest defences for exceptional cases where journalists may need to break the law (such as RIPA, the 2010 Bribery Act, and the 1998 Computer Misuse Act) to expose corruption or other criminal acts.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure judicial authorisation is required for the acquisition of communications data which might reveal journalists’ sources or other privileged communications, for any of the purposes allowed under RIPA;
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and allow journalists the opportunity to address the court before authorisation is granted, where this would not jeopardise the investigation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Undertake a post-legislative review of the 2013 Defamation Act, which Liberal Democrats drove through Parliament, to ensure the new provisions are reducing the chill of libel threats.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Introduce, after consultation on the detail, the changes to the 1998 Data Protection Act recommended by Lord Justice Leveson to provide a fairer balance between personal privacy and the requirements of journalism,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: ensuring that the position of investigative journalists is safeguarded.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To promote the independence of the media from political influence we will remove Ministers from any role in appointments to the BBC Trust or the Board of Ofcom.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To guarantee press freedom, we will pass a British ‘First Amendment’ law, to require the authorities and the courts to have regard to the importance of a free media in a democratic society.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To nurture public interest journalism and protect the public from press abuse, we are committed to a system of accountability that is totally independent of both government and the newspaper industry, as set out in the Royal Charter on Press Regulation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We share the hope of Lord Justice Leveson that the incentives for the press to sign up to genuinely independent self-regulation will succeed.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: But if, in the judgment of the Press Recognition Panel, after 12 months of operation, there is significant non-cooperation by newspaper publishers, then – as Leveson himself concluded –Parliament will need to act, drawing on a range of options including the legislative steps necessary to ensure that independent self-regulation is delivered.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Where possible, we would seek to do this on the same cross-party basis that achieved the construction of the Leveson scheme by the Royal Charter.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 8.3 Policing and security service powers
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats believe security and liberty are two sides of the same coin: you cannot have one without the other.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The police and intelligence agencies do vital work to protect the public and we are rightly proud of them.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: But we always have to be vigilant that the state does not overreach itself, as it has done at times through corruption, heavy-handedness or illiberal laws.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Ensure proper oversight of the security services.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Establish in legislation that the police and intelligence agencies should not obtain data on UK residents from foreign governments that it would not be legal to obtain in the UK under UK law.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Back a full judicial enquiry into complicity in torture if the current investigation by the Commons Intelligence and Security Committee investigation fails to get to truth.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: End indefinite detention for immigration purposes.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Introduce restrictions on the indefinite use of police bail.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Require judicial authorisation for the use of undercover police officers to infiltrate alleged criminal groups.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Get to the full truth about corrupt practices in parts of the police and the press by ensuring that the Daniel Morgan Panel Inquiry is completed expeditiously
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and that Part 2 of the Leveson Inquiry starts as soon as the criminal prosecutions in the hacking scandal are completed.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Identify practical alternatives to the use of closed material procedures within the justice system, including the provisions of the 2013 Justice and Security Act,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: with the aim of restoring the principle of open justice.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 8.4 Securing liberty online
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Securing our rights and freedoms in law
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.
