text: 9.1 Preventing crime
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Crime and fear of crime are amongst the greatest threats to our security and our ability to live our lives to the full.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Our focus is on trying to prevent crime from happening in the first place.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Design out opportunities for crime, by improving the built environment,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: the design of new technologies,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and community resilience.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Strengthen the What Works centre within the College of Policing and require HM Inspectorate of Constabulary to scrutinise the use of evidence by local forces in designing their policing plans.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Build on the success of crime maps to use data more effectively to reduce crime,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: working towards the publication of business-by-business data for crimes committed on commercial premises,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and exploring the feasibility of mandatory reporting of fraud losses by individual credit and debit card providers.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 9.2 Improving local policing
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We are successfully bringing down crime and improving the efficiency of our police forces, but there is more to do.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We believe the police could be far more effective with proper support and shared best practice.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Guarantee the police pursue the public’s priorities by replacing Police and Crime Commissioners with Police Boards made up of Councillors from across the force area.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Encourage police forces and other emergency services to work together at a local, regional and national level to reduce back office costs and deliver efficiency savings.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Support and expand Police Now, which is bringing high-flying graduates and skilled mid-career professionals into our police forces.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Explore the case for transferring responsibility for more serious national crime to the National Crime Agency, enabling local police forces to focus on local crime and anti-social behaviour.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Step up our work with EU partners to tackle serious and organised crime.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 9.3 Improve support for victims of crime
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The criminal justice system exists to protect the public from crime; where crime does occur victims are our first priority.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We need to make sure they, and their families, are supported both in the aftermath of crimes and throughout the justice system.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Enact a Victims’ Bill of Rights.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Create a single point of contact for victims to give early access to information and support.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Change sentencing guidelines to increase sentences available for hate crimes.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Give victims of crime a right to review what progress police have made to investigate the crime committed against them including cases where the police have declined to investigate.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Give victims a right to choose restorative justice.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Implement the Modern Slavery Strategy to reduce people trafficking and support victims.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 9.4 Tackling violence against women and girls
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: A fair society cannot tolerate today’s unacceptable level of violence against women and girls in Britain.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have made progress since 2010 but we will not rest until women feel safe and respected.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Ensure teachers, social workers, police officers and health workers in areas where there is high prevalence of female genital mutilation or forced marriage are trained to help those at risk.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Require the teaching of sexual consent in schools as part of age-appropriate sex and relationships education.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Improve the provision of rape crisis centres and refuges for victims of domestic violence with a national network and national sources of funding.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Protect funding for tackling violence against women and girls and maintain the post of International Champion for preventing this violence.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Create a national helpline for victims of domestic and sexual violence – regardless of gender – to provide support, encourage reporting and secure more convictions.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work to ensure the whole criminal justice system updates practice in line with the Director of Public Prosecutions’ guidance on sexual consent.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 9.5 Improving justice and rehabilitating offenders
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The criminal justice system can do more to turn people away from a life of crime.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have made progress in government, for the first time providing probation support for offenders serving sentences of less than twelve months.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Yet still, far too many people are simply warehoused in prison, instead of learning skills that will enable them to earn an honest living when they are released.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We believe that a large prison population is a sign of failure to rehabilitate, not a sign of success.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: So our aim is to significantly reduce the prison population by using more effective alternative punishments and correcting offending behaviour.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Prioritise prison for dangerous offenders and those who commit the most serious offences with increased use of tough non-custodial punishments including weekend or evening custody, curfews, unpaid work in the community and GPS tagging.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: This will enable us to introduce a presumption against short-term sentences that will help reduce the prison population and cut crime.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Promote Community Justice Panels and other local schemes designed to stop problems from escalating.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Extend the role of the Youth Justice Board to all offenders aged under 21,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: give them the power to commission mental health services
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and devolve youth custody budgets to Local Authorities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Create a Women’s Justice Board, modelled on the Youth Justice Board, to improve rehabilitation of female offenders.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Reform prisons so they become places of work, rehabilitation and learning, with offenders receiving an education and skills assessment within one week, starting a relevant course and programme of support within one month and able to complete courses on release.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Improve prison governance and accountability
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: with a new value added measure to assess progress in reducing reoffending, providing education and tackling addiction and mental health issues,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: enabling good prisons to earn greater autonomy.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will strengthen the independence of the Chief Inspectors of Prisons and Probation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Provide experts in courts and police stations to identify where mental health or a drug problem is behind an offender’s behaviour so they can be dealt with in a way that is appropriate.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will pilot US-style drug and alcohol courts.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Strengthen the ‘realistic prospect of custody’ test to reduce the use of remand for suspected offenders who can be safely monitored in the community and are unlikely to receive a prison sentence if found guilty.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats will adopt the default position that – unless there are strong reasons to the contrary in specific cases – public servants rather than commercial organisations should provide detention, prison, immigration enforcement and secure units.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 9.6 Ensuring access to justice
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Access to justice is an essential part of a free society and a functioning legal system.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In this Parliament we have had to make significant savings from the Legal Aid budget,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: but in the next Parliament our priority for delivering efficiency in the Ministry of Justice should be prison and court reform, using technology and innovation to reduce costs.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Review the criminal Legal Aid market and ensure there are no further savings without an impact assessment as to the viability of competitive and diverse market of Legal Aid providers.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Reduce pressure on the criminal Legal Aid budget by requiring company directors to take out insurance against prosecution for fraud and permitting the use of restrained assets to pay reasonable legal bills.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Carry out an immediate review of civil Legal Aid, judicial review and court fees, in consultation with the judiciary, to ensure Legal Aid is available to all those who need it,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: that those of modest means can bring applications for judicial review of allegedly unlawful government action
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 9.7 Tackling terrorism and violent extremism
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Terrorism and violent extremism remain a serious threat to the United Kingdom, which requires a proportionate response.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Work with religious and community leaders, civil society groups and social media sites to counter the narratives put forward by extremists,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and create the space for the expression of contrary viewpoints and religious interpretations.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Maintain laws that provide an effective defence against terrorist activity, including proscription of terrorist groups,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Terrorism Prevention and Investigation Measures,

text: and Temporary Exclusion Orders, which enable the security services to manage the return of those who have fought illegally in foreign conflicts.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure efforts to tackle terrorism do not stigmatise or alienate Muslims or any other ethnic or faith group,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and that government supports communities to help prevent those at risk of radicalisation from being drawn into illegal activity.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Review the process of assessing threats against different ethnic and religious communities to ensure all groups in the UK are properly protected.

text: 9.8 An effective approach to reducing drug harm
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: For too long the debate about effective ways to reduce the harm caused by drugs has been distorted by political prejudice.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Around the world, countries are trialling new approaches that are reducing drug harm, improving lives, reducing addiction and saving taxpayers’ money.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In the UK we have made good progress on treatment but we continue to give 80,000 people a year a criminal record for drug possession, blighting their employment chances,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and we still imprison 1,000 people a year for personal possession when they are not charged with dealing or any other offence.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Adopt the approach used in Portugal where those arrested for possession of drugs for personal use are diverted into treatment, education or civil penalties that do not attract a criminal record.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: As a first step towards reforming the system, legislate to end the use of imprisonment for possession of drugs for personal use,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: diverting resources towards tackling organised drug crime instead.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue to apply severe penalties to those who manufacture, import or deal in illegal drugs, and clamp down on those who produce and sell unregulated chemical highs.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 9.9 Restoring confidence in our borders
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The UK secures many benefits from immigration, which boosts our economy and helps staff our public services, especially our NHS.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: But we need to tackle the weaknesses in our immigration system, which threatened to undermine confidence in it.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: That is why we have led work fully to restore border checks on entry and exit.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We need to improve the administration of our system so we deal with asylum claims and visa applications promptly and return those who do not have a valid claim to be in the UK.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Then we can start to rebuild an open, tolerant Britain.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Complete the restoration of full entry and exit checks at our borders, to rebuild confidence in immigration control, and allow targeting of resources at those who overstay their visas.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Speed up the processing of asylum claims, reducing the time genuine refugees have to wait before they can settle into life in the UK and making it easier to remove those who do not have a right to be here.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will require working age asylum seekers who have waited more than six months for their claim to be processed to seek work like other benefit claimants, and only to receive benefits if they are unable to do so.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will end the use of the ‘Azure Card’ for administering benefits in the asylum system.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Double the number of inspections on employers to ensure all statutory employment legislation is being respected.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Separate students within official immigration statistics, while taking tough action against any educational institution that allows abuse of the student route into the UK.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Present to Parliament an annual assessment of skill and labour market shortfalls and surpluses and their impact on the economy, public services and local communities,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: together with an audit report on the migration control system, allowing full Parliamentary oversight of Britain’s migration policies.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue requirements for all new claimants for Jobseekers Allowance (JSA) to have their English language skills assessed, with JSA then being conditional on attending English language courses for those whose English is poor.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 10.1 Better politics
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Unfair votes, overcentralisation of decision-making, the power of patronage and the influence of powerful corporate lobbies mean ordinary citizens and local communities are too often excluded and sidelined in politics today.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We need to reform British politics to make it more representative and more empowering of our citizens so it commands greater public confidence.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Take big money out of politics by capping donations to political parties at £10,000 per person each year,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and introducing wider reforms to party funding along the lines of the 2011 report of the Committee on Standards in Public Life, funded from savings from existing government spending on politics.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Protect the rights of trade union members to have their subscriptions, including political levies, deducted from their salary,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and strengthen members’ political freedoms by letting them choose which political party they wish to support through such automatic payments.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will encourage wider participation in trade union ballots through electronic voting.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Introduce votes at age 16 for elections and referendums across the UK,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and make it easier to register to vote in schools and colleges.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Reform the House of Lords with a proper democratic mandate, starting from the proposals in the 2012 Bill.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Reform our voting systems for elections to local government and Westminster to ensure more proportional representation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will introduce the Single Transferable Vote for local government elections in England
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and for electing MPs across the UK.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will reduce the number of MPs but only as part of the introduction of a reformed, fair, voting system.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Cancel the boundary review due to report in 2018.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: While new constituencies would need to be established for a new voting system, we believe constituency boundary reviews should respect natural geographical communities, with greater flexibility for the Boundary Commission to deviate from exact equality to take account of community ties and continuity of representation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Explore options to strengthen and simplify the voting rights of UK citizens living abroad and address disenfranchisement experienced by some.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work with the broadcasters to formalise the process for Leaders' Debates in General Elections, helping ensure they happen and setting a clear threshold for those eligible to participate.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Strengthen and expand the lobbying register and prohibit MPs from accepting paid lobbying work.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will consider carefully the work of the independent reviewer into the impact of third party spending regulations to ensure the right balance has been struck.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will also remove the discrimination against third parties by requiring political parties to include the cost of staffing in their national expense limits in the same way as third parties now do.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To reform Parliament in particular we will: Strengthen the role of MPs in amending the Budget and scrutinising government spending proposals.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Make Parliament more family-friendly, and establish a review to pave the way for MP jobsharing arrangements.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Implement a House Business committee to ensure that Parliament and not the executive decides the Parliamentary timetable, ending the ‘talking out’ of private members’ business.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Building on the Wright Committee recommendations of 2009, and experiences of Coalition, we will conduct a full review of Parliamentary procedures, which should formally recognise individual political parties not just Government and Opposition.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 10.2 A decentralised but United Kingdom
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats have a proud record of leading the way on giving greater powers to the nations of the UK.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrat Ministers were the ones to lead the 2012 Scotland Act and the 2014 Wales Act through Parliament, transferring more financial autonomy to Scotland than ever before
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and Wales’ first tax powers.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: And in the last months, we have given the governments of Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland the power to lower the voting age to 16.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Now we need go further.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We must deliver on the promises made to the people of Scotland and the rest of the UK to further decentralise power.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In short, we will deliver Home Rule to each of the nations of a strong, federal United Kingdom.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Constitutional change has taken place rapidly.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We now need to make sure all the new arrangements work together coherently and we will therefore establish a UK Constitutional Convention, made up from representatives of the political parties, academia, civic society and members of the public, tasked with producing a full written constitution for the UK, to report within two years.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: There are many powers that we think should be devolved on an equal basis to the existing Parliaments and Assemblies.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will transfer power to: Borrow for investment.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Manage the Crown Estate’s economic assets.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Control a range of benefits for older people, carers and disabled people.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Scotland
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: After the independence referendum, the Smith Commission brought Scotland’s five main parties together to agree what further powers should be assigned to the Scottish Parliament.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats ensured the package of powers reflects Scotland’s key priorities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The Scottish Parliament should raise in tax more than half of what it spends in its budget.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: A Scottish welfare system should allow the Scottish Parliament to change the benefits regime where there is specific Scottish need or priority, with a starting budget of around £3 billion.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: These powers and more will deliver for the Scottish people: an empowered and accountable Scottish Parliament
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: in a strong and secure United Kingdom.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will deliver Home Rule for Scotland by implementing the Smith Commission proposals in full in the first session of the next Parliament.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will continue to make the case for powers currently held at Westminster and Holyrood to be transferred directly to local government where appropriate.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Wales
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We endorse the recent St. David’s Day announcement and will implement it in full, devolving powers over energy, ports, local elections, broadcasting and more, and implementing a reserved powers model.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: But this announcement does not go far enough.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats will go further and deliver proper Home Rule for Wales and a Welsh Parliament by: Implementing the remaining Silk Part 1 proposals on financial powers for Wales.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will consider the work of the Government’s review on devolution of Air Passenger Duty (APD),
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: with a view to devolving long-haul APD.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Implementing the Silk Part 2 proposals by: Transferring powers from the UK Parliament to the National Assembly over S4C, sewerage, transport, teachers’ pay, youth justice, policing and in the longer term other justice powers.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Devolving funding of Network Rail in relation to the Wales network.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Strengthening the capacity of the National Assembly to scrutinise legislation and hold the Welsh Government to account.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Allowing the Welsh Government to set its own bank holidays.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Providing for a Welsh Parliament, preventing Westminster from being able to override Wales on devolved matters,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and devolving the power to amend electoral arrangements for the Assembly and local elections in Wales with a two thirds majority.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Giving the Children’s Commissioner for Wales the power to examine issues that affect children in Wales but are not within the control of the Welsh Government.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In addition, to help create jobs and boost growth in Wales, we will abolish the economically distorting tolls on the Severn Bridge once the debts are paid off.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Northern Ireland
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats wish to see a permanently peaceful, stable, non-sectarian
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and truly democratic society in Northern Ireland.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will work constructively with the political parties in Northern Ireland and with the Irish Government to ensure the political stability of the Northern Ireland Assembly and other institutions of the Belfast Agreement.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To grow the economy, tackle social exclusion, overcome inequality and deliver efficiencies in public services, Liberal Democrats will support policies and initiatives that promote sharing over separation and counter the cost of division.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: A key aspect of this is dealing with the legacy of the past.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The Stormont House Agreement represents another stage in the intensive work necessary to build long-term peace, stability and prosperity in Northern Ireland.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In Government we delivered on the commitment to enable the devolution of Corporation Tax to Northern Ireland by April 2017.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will continue to work with all parties to implement the full package of measures in the Stormont House Agreement and address outstanding issues.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will build on this by: Keeping under review the prospect of further devolution of fiscal powers to the Northern Ireland Assembly
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and other powers that would improve the financial accountability of the Assembly.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Promoting a strong mechanism for working constructively with civic society in Northern Ireland.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Working to ensure the interface is smooth and effective between national security and counter-terrorism policing on the one hand, and local policing and criminal justice activities on the other.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Supporting changes to the powers and internal mechanisms of the Northern Ireland Assembly that reinforce the development of normal, democratic principles
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and enhances the creation of a shared future beyond sectarianism and division.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Working with the political parties in Northern Ireland to tackle the cost of division and ensuring all Government policies in Northern Ireland support the aim of a genuine Shared Future for all.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: England
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Devolution of power to Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland has implications for the UK Parliament and its dual role in legislating for England as well as the federal UK.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: It is possible that a future UK government could use the support of MPs representing Scotland, Wales or Northern Ireland to secure the passage of legislation that only affects England, even if the majority in England were opposed.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: This would be a key issue for our proposed Constitutional Convention to address.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats believe an English-only stage in legislation affecting England should be considered, so English MPs can have a separate say on laws that only affect England.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: However, this would need to be on a proportional basis, genuinely reflecting the balance of opinion in England, not the distorted picture generated by the First Past the Post system.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Beyond Parliament, there is much to change to improve the way communities in England are governed.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: By returning power to the villages, towns, cities and regions of England we can drive growth, improve public services and give people freedom to run their own lives.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To rejuvenate local government in England, we will: Reduce the powers of Ministers to interfere in democratically elected local government.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Remove the requirement to hold local referenda for Council Tax changes, ensuring Councillors are properly accountable for their decisions by introducing fair votes.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Build on the success of City Deals and Growth Deals to devolve more power and resources to groups of Local Authorities and Local Enterprise Partnerships, starting with back-to-work support.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Establish a Government process to deliver greater devolution of financial responsibility to English Local Authorities, and any new devolved bodies in England, building on the work of the Independent Commission on Local Government Finance.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Any changes must balance the objectives of more local autonomy and fair equalisation between communities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In some areas of England there is an even greater appetite for powers, but not every part of the country wants to move at the same speed and there cannot be a one-size-fits-all approach.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will therefore introduce Devolution on Demand, enabling even greater devolution of powers from Westminster to Councils or groups of Councils working together – for example to a Cornish Assembly.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Funding
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The nations of the United Kingdom have long had different needs with regard to funding.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The Barnett Formula is the mechanism used to adjust spending allocations across the UK.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The Liberal Democrats have already delivered a substantial extension of financial powers to the nations of the UK and we will devolve further fiscal powers to the devolved governments.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In order to ensure reliable funding, we will retain the Barnett Formula as the basis for future spending allocations for Scotland and Northern Ireland.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: This will protect the individual nations’ budgets from external shocks like the recent global drop in the price of oil.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We recognise the findings of the Holtham Commission that the current formula underfunds Wales and will commission work to update this analysis.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will address the imbalance by immediately entrenching a Barnett floor set at a level that reflects the need for Wales to be funded fairly,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and seek over a Parliament to increase the Welsh block grant to an equitable level.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 10.3 Everyday democracy
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: To lead a fulfilled life, people need power over more than just their government.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats will spread democracy in everyday life by encouraging mutuals, cooperatives, and employee participation and by increasing the opportunities for people to take democratic control over the services on which they rely.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will encourage citizens to engage in practical social action, seeing government as an enabler and facilitator rather than just a commissioner and provider of services.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Aim to increase the number of Neighbourhood, Community and Parish Councils and promote tenant management in social housing.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Encourage employers to promote employee participation and employee ownership, aiming to increase further the proportion of GDP in employee-owned businesses.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will change company law to permit a German-style two-tier board structure to include employees.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Introduce mandatory arbitration for strikes likely to cause widespread public disruption, enabling us to defend workers’ rights to strike while ensuring continued service in essential public services.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Strengthen worker participation in decision-making, including staff representation on remuneration committees, and the right for employees who collectively own 5% of a company to be represented on the board.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Give football fans a greater say in how their clubs are run by encouraging the reform of football governance rules to promote engagement between clubs and supporters.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Support local libraries and ensure any libraries under threat of closure are offered first for transfer to the local community.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Spread mutual structures and employee participation through the public sector.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Strengthen community rights to run local public services, and protect community assets like pubs by bringing forward a Community Right to Buy.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will ensure planning permission is required to convert a pub into alternative uses.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Support social investment, ensuring charities and social enterprises can access the support and finance they need to develop and deliver innovative, sustainable solutions to challenges in their communities.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 10.4 Protecting the space for democratic debate

text: We are committed to completing a comprehensive Strategic Defence and Security Review early in the next Parliament to inform future defence spending decisions.

text: We recognise that the world has changed fundamentally since the last such review.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Use the SDSR to establish a Single Security Budget, including not just conventional defence spending but the work of our security agencies, cyber defences and soft power interventions.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The Single Security Budget will be distributed by the SDSR process, as part of an overall Spending Review.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Maintain strong and effective armed forces and the capability to deploy rapidly expeditionary forces.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Set long-term budgets to invest in the right equipment at competitive prices.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Britain’s membership of the EU is essential for creating a stronger economy and for projecting influence in the world.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and developing the EU Energy Union.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Support EU free movement, which is hugely beneficial to millions of British citizens living in other European countries as well as to the British economy and the public sector, for example the thousands of European health workers who make a vital contribution to the running of the NHS.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will prevent any perceived ‘right to claim’ by tightening benefit rules for EU migrants, including reducing, and ultimately abolishing, payment of Child Benefit to children who are not resident in the UK.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will also lengthen transitional controls for new EU member countries, and eliminate loopholes.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Cooperate with other European countries to address the pressure of migration across the Mediterranean.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will push for more effective EU measures to prevent the tragic loss of life for many crossing the Mediterranean, including through greater cooperation with anti-human-trafficking operations.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue to work closely with other EU governments on foreign policy issues towards Russia, Ukraine, the Middle East and North Africa.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will build on our already close defence cooperation with France, the Netherlands, the Nordic states and other European countries, as the most reliable basis for British security.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 11.4 International development
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: In government, Liberal Democrats have led the way on international development and aid.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have worked to end the use of rape as a weapon of war.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We have led international efforts to tackle the Ebola crisis in Sierra Leone
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and, through investment in the Global Alliance for Vaccines and Immunisations (GAVI), Britain is a global leader in preventing communicable diseases.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Now, we need to build on progress made since the agreement of the Millennium Development Goals and work to eliminate absolute poverty by 2030 – through aid but also through economic development.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Develop a whole-government approach to development.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue to promote private sector economic development, ensuring this benefits local people and small businesses not just multinational corporations.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will lead international action to ensure global companies pay fair taxes in the developing countries in which they operate,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: including tightening anti-tax haven rules
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and requiring large companies to publish their tax payments and profits for each country in which they operate.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Maintain our commitment to spend 0.7% of UK Gross National Income on overseas development, which the International Development Act 2015, introduced by a Liberal Democrat, now enshrines in law.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will adhere to the OECD’s definition of what activities qualify.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Conduct a full Bilateral and Multilateral Aid Review to ensure that the Department for International Development continues to work in the right places and through the right channels.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Continue building the resilience of poorer countries to resist future disasters, investing in healthcare and infrastructure and training emergency response volunteers,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and respond generously to humanitarian crises wherever they may occur.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work to ensure the Sustainable Development Goals aim to: Safeguard the sustainability of the planet.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Leave no one behind, helping the most vulnerable as well as improving average living standards.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will ensure people do not suffer discrimination or disadvantage because of gender, sexual orientation, disability or ethnic origin.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Eliminate absolute poverty by 2030.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Invest to eliminate within a generation preventable diseases like TB, HIV and malaria
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and explore new ways to support public and private research and development into treatment for these and other deadly diseases and infections.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Create a new civil society partnership scheme to build links between peoples in rich and poor countries, including partnerships between communities, trade unions or emergency services.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 11.5 International action on the environment
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The open and internationalist approach Liberal Democrats have always adopted is particularly crucial when it comes to environmental policy.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Pollution does not respect national borders, and wildlife and ecosystems are not constrained by political boundaries.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Challenges like climate change and deforestation are too massive for individual countries to tackle alone.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Continue pushing for a 50% reduction in EU greenhouse gas emissions by 2030
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and the greater use of EU funds to support low-carbon investments,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: while ensuring the UK meets its own climate commitments
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and plays a leadership role in efforts to combat climate change.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work to secure agreement on a global climate treaty at the 2015 UN Climate Conference,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: supported by a well-financed Green Climate Fund to assist poorer countries to tackle and adapt to climate change.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Work with regulatory bodies and financial investors to establish a global reporting standard for fossil fuel companies on the potential impact of future restrictions on carbon emissions on their asset base.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Provide greater resources for international environmental cooperation,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: particularly on actions to tackle illegal trade in timber, wildlife and fish.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Argue for an EU and global target of halting net global deforestation by 2020
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: – including supporting better forest law enforcement and governance and sustainable agriculture,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: closing loopholes in the EU Timber Regulation
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and ensuring that by 2020 only legal and sustainable timber products can be sold in the UK.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Ensure UK and EU development aid, free trade and investment agreements support environmental goals and sustainable investment,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: including maintaining the UK’s International Climate Fund
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and supporting direct bilateral programmes with developing countries on climate change.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Create a one million square kilometre southern Atlantic Ocean reserve.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Push for the creation of a marine nature reserve in the Arctic Ocean,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: promote the highest possible environmental standards for UK companies operating in the region
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and press for a ban on EU-flagged vessels undertaking industrial fishing in the previously unfished areas of the Arctic.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: 11.6  Standing up for Liberal values
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Liberal Democrats believe British foreign policy and international aid should seek to advance human rights
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and democracy throughout the world.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We believe all people – regardless of ethnicity, disability, age, belief, gender or sexual orientation – deserve a freer, fairer and more prosperous world.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will: Continue to support free media and a free and open Internet around the world, championing the free flow of information.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Maintain funding to BBC World Service, BBC Monitoring and the British Council.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Develop a comprehensive strategy for promoting the decriminalisation of homosexuality around the world,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and advancing the cause of LGBT+ rights.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Prioritise support, protection and equal rights for women and girls, which is essential for effective, sustainable economic development.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will pursue an International Gender Equality Strategy,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: work to secure women’s rights to education
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and freedom from forced marriage;
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and aim to end female genital mutilation worldwide within a generation.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: Extend existing reporting rules to establish consistent requirements on all large UK companies to report on the social, environmental and human rights impacts of their activities and those of their supply chains.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: The recent Islamist extremist attacks on journalists in Europe are a sharp reminder of the need to protect freedom of speech and belief internationally.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: We will appoint an Ambassador-level Champion for Freedom of Belief to drive British diplomatic efforts in this field,
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.

text: and we will campaign for the abolition of blasphemy, sedition, apostasy and criminal libel laws worldwide, having already been responsible for ending them in this country.
title: Manifesto 2015. Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.
